short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pop up Panopto video, show actual time left based on speed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to pop-up a video from Panopto and move it anywhere you want on the screen, including another screen.
You can also see the actual remaining time left on a video given the playback speed.
